message: This is my first offer. I propose we divide the money 700k for me and 300k for you. Let me know if this works for you.
I'll give you a smaller share this time, but it's still a good deal for you. What do you think?
I've adjusted my offer based on the new value of money. I propose we divide the money 640k for me and 360k for you. Let me know what you think.
I'll give you a tiny bit more, but I'm not getting taken advantage of. What's your next move?
Considering the decreasing value of money, I've made an adjustment. My proposal is for me to receive 627,200 and Bob to receive 372,800. Please let me know if this works for you.
I'm getting desperate, but I'll give you a tiny fraction. Take it or leave it!
